summary: Customer reported internet dropping every hour. Technician scheduled for tomorrow 10am-12pm to resolve fiber signal loss. No charge for the service.

actions_taken.details: Technician scheduled for tomorrow 10am-12pm

summary: Billing issue: customer charged twice, pending reversal in 3-5 business days, ticket raised with reference number BRN-55219.

actions_taken.details: Ticket created with reference number BRN-55219
Email sent to customer with reference number BRN-55219

summary: Customer reported discrepancy in internet speed, agent assisted by checking Wi-Fi speeds and shipping a cable for testing.

actions_taken.details: Refreshed provisioning and shipped a cable for testing
Email sent to customer with instructions to restart modem and router

summary: Customer wants to cancel connection due to moving to another city. Disconnection initiated. No charges expected.

actions_taken.details: Equipment pickup scheduled for 3 days

summary: The customer reported a missed appointment. The agent apologized, rescheduled the visit for today 6pm-8pm, and applied a 1-day service credit.

actions_taken.details: Rescheduled visit for today 6pm-8pm
1-day service credit applied

summary: Customer forgot Wi-Fi password. Agent provided solution to check the default password on the router sticker. Issue resolved.

actions_taken.details: Provided solution to customer

summary: Known outage in customer's area, credit offered for inconvenience, updates sent.

actions_taken.details: Credit applied for 2‑day
Updates sent to SMS

summary: Plan upgrade to 500 Mbps initiated. Key conflict: router compatibility resolved. Final resolution: plan activated.

actions_taken.details: Plan upgraded to 500 Mbps

summary: Customer experiencing no signal due to unplugged power adapter. Issue resolved after plugging it in and waiting 2 minutes.

actions_taken.details: None required

summary: Customer reported receiving spam calls after sharing their number on our site. Escalated to security team. Requested written confirmation.

actions_taken.details: Email sent with case ID SEC-90021 and privacy policy link

followups_required.details: Follow up with customer to confirm receipt of email and resolution

summary: Wi-Fi signal weak in bedroom. Customer requested a mesh extender. Final resolution pending customer decision.

actions_taken.details: Mesh extender recommended for weak Wi-Fi signal in bedroom.

summary: Billing dispute over late fee; late fee waived as a courtesy.

actions_taken.details: Waived late fee of ₹100 plus taxes

summary: Contact number update request due to address change at 123 Maple Street, Apt 4B.. Confirmation from SMS expected shortly.

actions_taken.details: Updated contact number for customer

summary: Internet outage due to physical line break caused by construction. Field team dispatched to resolve issue. Estimated resolution time 4-6 hours.

actions_taken.details: Field team dispatched to resolve issue.

summary: Customer inquired about paying their bill over the phone, but was directed to use the app or automated system for security reasons.

actions_taken.details: Customer was transferred to the automated system for bill payment.

summary: Customer set up port forwarding for gaming. Key conflict: customer needed assistance with router login. Final resolution: customer successfully set up port forwarding.

actions_taken.details: Guided customer through router login and port forwarding setup

summary: Customer's smart TV wouldn't connect to Wi-Fi, but phone did. Agent helped customer switch to 2.4GHz band. TV now connects successfully.

actions_taken.details: Split Wi-Fi bands to resolve TV connectivity issue

summary: Customer is moving and wants to transfer their service to a new house. The transfer fee is ₹500. The transfer is scheduled for the 20th.

actions_taken.details: Transfer of service to new house scheduled for the 20th

summary: Customer reported high ping in Valorant on today. Agent identified bottleneck and rerouted traffic. Customer restarted in 5 minutes.

actions_taken.details: Rerouted traffic to resolve high ping issue

summary: GST invoice request for business 'Tech Solutions' resolved with invoice added to portal.

actions_taken.details: GST invoice added to portal for customer's business
